ns0:revision.ns0:comment: Robô: A limpar links interwikis antigos

={{-pt-}}= == Forma Verbal == '''abades''' # [[segunda]] [[pessoa]] do [[singular]] do [[presente]] do [[subjuntivo]] de '''[[abadar]]'''.
== Forma de substantivo == '''abades''' # [[plural]] [[de]] '''[[abade]]'''.
== Pronúncia == === Carioca === * [[AFI]]: {{AFI|[a.ˈba.ʤiʃ]}} * [[X-SAMPA]]: /a.ba.dZiS/
=== Paranaense === * [[AFI]]: {{AFI|[a.ˈba.des]}} * [[X-SAMPA]]: /a.ba.des/ *;ou * [[AFI]]: {{AFI|[a.ˈba.ʤis]}} * [[X-SAMPA]]: /a.ba.dZis/
